DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study measure composition five common type date ( Fara 'd , Lulu , Abu ouma ' n , Dabbas Khalas ) calculate Glycemic Indices ( GI ) date test healthy diabetic subject . Thirteen healthy volunteer ten subject type 2 diabetes mellitus enrol study . The date ' flesh composition analysis show date contain high percentage carbohydrate ( total sugar , 65-68 % ) . The measured mean glycemic index date among healthy individual 54.0 , 53.5 , 46.3 , 49.1 55.1 Fara 'd , Lulu , Abu Ouma ' n , Dabbas Khalas , respectively . Corresponding mean glycemic index among individual type 2 diabetes similar 46.1 , 43.8 , 51.8 , 50.2 , 53.0 . Thus test five variety date classify low glycemic index food item .
DOC.brief_title: The Glycemic Indices Five Common Varieties Dates Tested Among Healthy Diabetic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The United Arab Emirates ( UAE ) transition rapidly last 40 year . This lead dramatic increase prevalence obesity , metabolic syndrome , dyslipidaemia , hypertension , prediabetes diabetes . Daily consumption date norm.The main objective study measure composition five common type date ( Fara 'd , Lulu , Abu ouma ' n , Dabbas Khalas ) calculate Glycemic Indices ( GI ) date test equally healthy diabetic subject . Thirteen healthy volunteer ten subject type 2 diabetes mellitus enrol study . The date ' flesh composition analysis show date contain high percentage carbohydrate ( total sugar , 65-68 % ) . The measured mean glycemic index date among healthy individual 54.0 , 53.5 , 46.3 , 49.1 55.1 Fara 'd , Lulu , Abu Ouma ' n , Dabbas Khalas , respectively . Corresponding mean glycemic index among individual type 2 diabetes similar 46.1 , 43.8 , 51.8 , 50.2 , 53.0 . Thus test five variety date classify low glycemic index food item potential health benefit healthy diabetic individual alike .
DOC.criteria: Adult Healthy control type 2 diabetes mellitus Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 ) Presence gastroenterological disorder Alimentary tract surgery A history gastroenteritis prior six month Any disease may affect glucose metabolism Alcohol intake Smoking Taking medication ( except metformin ) Poorly uncontrolled diabetes ( HbA1c > 8 % ) The presence chronic disease presence acute illness
